name: Witchcraft
desc: Witch Abilities apply a curse to enemies for @CurseDuration@ seconds. When a cursed enemy dies, the curse spreads to the nearest enemy.
<row>(@MinUnits@) AND green, taking @CurseHealPct@% of their max Health as magic damage per second</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) AND frail, taking @TrueDamagePct@% bonus true damage from Witches</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) AND a frog, stunned for @FrogPolymorphDuration@ seconds every @FrogPolymorphCooldown@ seconds. All other curse effects are increased by @ChaseIncreasePercent@%.</row>

name: Arcana
desc: Use the Arcana signifier item to choose a High Arcana champion. Each Arcana grants power based on a different condition.
<scaleLevel>Ahri</scaleLevel>: Your team gains %i:scaleAP% Ability Power, plus more for each unique 3-star champion.
<rules>Use the Arcana Signifier item on a different Arcana ally to change this effect</rules>
<scaleLevel>Hecarim</scaleLevel>: Champions holding an item gain %i:scaleDR% @HecarimDRAmount*100@% Durability and %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage.
<rules>Use the Arcana Signifier item on a different Arcana ally to change this effect</rules>
<scaleLevel>Tahm Kench</scaleLevel>: Your team gains bonus Health %i:scaleHealth% for each active trait (except uniques).
<rules>Use the Arcana Signifier item on a different Arcana ally to change this effect</rules>
<scaleLevel>Xerath</scaleLevel>: Abilities deal bonus true damage for every @XerathNumCharms@ Charms you've purchased this game (@XerathNumCharmsHR@ in Hyper Roll).
<rules>Use the Arcana Signifier item on a different Arcana ally to change this effect.</rules>
<scaleLevel>Arcana Emblem</scaleLevel>: Your team gains %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp plus more for each emblem equipped on your units. Tactician's Items count twice.
<rules>Use the Arcana Signifier item on a different Arcana ally to change this effect</rules>

name: Frost
desc: Frost champions gain %i:scaleAP% Ability Power and %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage. The first few enemies to die become allied ice soldiers which lure enemy attacks if they are within range and retargeting.

name: Hunter
desc: Hunters gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage, increased the first time they get a takedown each combat.

name: Best Friends
desc: Norra summons Yuumi to help your team! She can be attached to allies by holding her over them. Yuumi shares her Ability Power with Norra and dies when Norra does.

name: Druid
desc: Wukong does not have a trait bonus, but instead has a powerful Ability and increased stats.

name: Scholar
desc: Scholars gain bonus %i:scaleMana% Mana on attack and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @ManaPerAttack@ %i:scaleMana% per attack, @AP@ %i:scaleAP%, and Abilities heal an ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt</row>

name: Multistriker
desc: Multistrikers' attacks have a chance to trigger @NumBonusAttacks@ extra attacks.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance; heal @OnHitHealPerc*100@% max Health every attack</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% chance; heal @OnHitHealPerc*100@% max Health every attack</row>

name: Bat Queen
desc: When Morgana's bats kill an enemy, they have a @PercentChanceToAbduct@% chance to abduct a 1-star copy of it.<ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSetEventCT>
In Choncc's Treasure, the chance to abduct increases at stage 3-1 and 4-1.</ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSetEventCT>

name: Warrior
desc: Warriors gain %i:scaleSV% Omnivamp and %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp. When Warriors drop below @HealthThreshold*100@% health, they gain double %i:scaleDA%.

name: Chrono
desc: Combat start: begin a @Timer@ second countdown, which speeds up by @SecondsPerCast@ second after each Chrono Ability cast. At the end of the countdown, gain a special effect:
<row>(@MinUnits@) AND freeze time for @FreezeDuration@ seconds, Chronos keep fighting and gain @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP% </row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) Freeze time for @FreezeDuration@ seconds, your team heals @TimeHeal*100@% %i:scaleHealth%; Chronos keep fighting and gain @BonusAP@ %i:scaleAP% and @BonusAS@% %i:scaleAS%</row>

name: Incantor
desc: When Incantors attack or cast, all Incantors gain stacks of %i:scaleAP% up to @MaxStacks@. Every other attack grants @StacksPerAttack@ stack, and each Ability cast grants @StacksPerCast@ stacks.

name: Ascendant
desc: (1) Ascendant Charms can appear in your shop. The odds increase by @PercentageChancePerPlayerCombat@% after player combat, up to @MaxPercentageChance@%. When you buy one, the odds reset.

name: Faerie
desc: Faeries gain %i:scaleHealth% Health and create special items that become stronger with trait tiers.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Gain Queen's Crown that grants @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp</row>

name: Relic
desc: After combat, Milio has a 40/60/100% chance to convert a temporary relic component into a real component.

name: Preserver
desc: Your team heals for a percent of their max %i:scaleHealth% Health every @Duration@ seconds. If they're full Health, restore %i:scaleMana% Mana instead.

name: Vanguard
desc: Combat start and at @HealthThreshold*100@% Health: Gain a Shield for a percent of max Health for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

name: Eldritch
desc: When your team loses @HealthRatio*100@% of their Health, an Old God awakens. It gains @PercentHealthPerStarLevel*100@% Health and @APPerStarLevel*100@% Ability Power for each Eldritch star level.

name: Shapeshifter
desc: Shapeshifters gain %i:scaleHealth% max Health. After their first Ability cast, they triple this effect.

name: Blaster
desc: Blasters gain %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp, which increases for @Duration@ seconds after casting their Ability.

name: Bastion
desc: Your team gains %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% @TeamwideResists@ Armor and Magic Resist.
Bastions gain more, and the value doubles in the first @Duration@ seconds of combat.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% and @NumUnits@ champions starting combat in the back 2 rows are invulnerable until 4 Bastions die</row>

name: Ravenous
desc: Briar gains %i:scaleDA% @TOOLTIPDamageAmpPerHealth*100@% Damage Amp for each player health you are missing. Each round, gain a Light Snack to give her <scaleHealth>@BriarHealthGain@ %i:scaleHealth%</scaleHealth> in exchange for @TacticianHealthToFeed@ of your player health.<ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSetEventCT>
In Choncc's Treasure, Light Snack's effect will be enhanced at stage 3-1 and 4-1.</ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSetEventCT>

name: Dragon
desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Dragon attacks and Abilities @BurnPercent@% <TFTKeyword>Burn</TFTKeyword> and <TFTKeyword>Wound</TFTKeyword> enemies for @BurnWoundDuration@ seconds.</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) The power of friendship upgrades all dragon Abilities!</row>
<rules>Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second</rules>

name: Honeymancy
desc: Honeymancers gain @MiniCount@ Bees that deal magic damage to their target every @Period@ seconds. Each Bee deals damage based on the damage a Honeymancer deals and takes.
When a Honeymancer dies, they leave @NumTransfers@ Bees that follow nearby Honeymancers for the rest of combat.
<row>(@MinUnits@) @BonusDamage*100@% of damage dealt, @DamageReceived*100@% of damage taken</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @BonusDamage*100@% of damage dealt, @DamageReceived*100@% of damage taken</row>
<row>(@MinUnits@) @BonusDamage*100@% of damage dealt, @DamageReceived*100@% of damage taken. Bees deal damage twice as often.</row>

name: Portal
desc: Combat start: Portal champions Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
Objects from other dimensions fly out of a portal every few seconds to help allies and disrupt enemies. The portal becomes @IncreasePerStarLevel*100@% stronger for each Portal champion's star level.

name: Mage
desc: Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

name: Sugarcraft
desc: Sugarcrafters build a layer cake from sugar. Gain sugar for each component your champions are holding after player combat.
They gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power, increased by @BonusRatio*100@% for each cake layer. When the cake has reached @MaxLayers@ layers, gain treats instead!

Sugar per round: <TFTBonus>@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_SugarToAdd@</TFTBonus> = @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_TotalComponents@ components x @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_TraitSugarMult@ from trait

name: Pyro
desc: Your team gains @BaseASPct@% %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed. Pyro champions gain more %i:scaleAS% and execute enemies under @ExecutePct@% Health.
For each kill, Pyro champions create an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every @NumCinders@ cinders you collect, your team gains @ASPctPerNumCinders@% more %i:scaleAS%.
